hero.title: Your Terminal Companion for
hero.subtitle: A beautifully crafted CLI tool that brings prayer times, Quran, Hadith, and spiritual tools directly to your command line. Built for developers, by developers.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed to enhance your Ramadan experience without leaving your terminal

prayer.title: Accurate Prayer Times
prayer.description: Get precise prayer times for any city worldwide with 15+ calculation methods including ISNA, Muslim World League, and Umm al-Qura.

quran.title: Quran Reader
quran.description: Read all 114 Surahs with authentic Arabic text and English translations. Features proper RTL rendering for beautiful Arabic display.

countdown.title: Ramadan Tracker
countdown.description: Smart countdown that adapts to your location's moon sighting. Automatically detects pre-Ramadan, during Ramadan, and post-Ramadan states.

hadith.title: Daily Hadith
hadith.description: Access authentic Ramadan-related hadiths with proper transliteration and English translations from Sahih collections.

zakat.title: Zakat Calculator
zakat.description: Interactive wealth calculator with step-by-step guidance. Calculates Nisab threshold and final Zakat obligation (2.5%).

tasbih.title: Digital Tasbih
tasbih.description: Keyboard-driven dhikr counter with visual progress tracking. Features 6 preset dhikr patterns for your daily adhkar.

commands.subtitle: Intuitive commands that feel natural in your terminal
